descriptionHtml:
A simple male follower mod made initially for personal use. 

[b]Race: [/b]Redguard
[b]Where to find him:[/b] The Bee and Barb in Riften.
[b]Marriable:[/b] Yes.
[b]Combat Style:[/b] Spellsword.
[b]Level:[/b] 10-80

[b]Default Gear:[/b]
-Gold (500)
-Grand Soul Gem (filled)
-Iron Sword
-Mage Boots
-Necklace of Magicka
-Novice Robes of Destruction
-Potion of Magicka (5)

[b]Skills:[/b]
-Destruction
-Light Armor
-One Handed
-Restoration

[b]Perks:[/b]
-Agile Defender
-Armsman
-Augmented Flames
-Apprentice Destruction
-Novice Destruction
-Light Foot
-Stealth

[b]Spells:[/b]
-Fast Healing
-Firebolt
-Flames
-Oakflesh
-Raise Zombie
-Steadfast Ward

The hair is a standalone version of the amazing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/683]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by Kalilies. Everthing else in his appearance is vanilla, so it will be affected by mods that changes the default skin, beard, brows and scars textures and male body type.

[b]To make Kleb'r look like in the screenshots:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles[/url][b] [/b]by Chris57 (Younger Faces Merged with Men by Geonox) 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards [/url]by Ithot
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] by Ithot 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam 

[b]Mods used in the screenshots:
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82543/?]DCR - King Crusader Armor [/url]by Angilla
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25476/?]Evil MasterMind Armor [/url]by Zerofrost
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light [/url]by tktk1
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67090/?]Liliths Lacerator - Custom Rapier and Greatsword[/url] by wiikki 


Sorry for the low quality screenshots :p
author: brunoarchie
